es.ull.datamining.core

Class AttributeClasses

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ull.datamining.core.AttributeClasses

  • public class AttributeClasses
extends java.lang.Object
    Classes of the attribute. If a attribute is nominal, this have a array list of classes.
    Author:
    Ivan Steven Ramirez Ladino (alu0100537321@ull.edu.es)
